author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Place the oil and butter in a saucepan over a low heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add the mushroom slices and cook for a further 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the cream and parsley to the pan and bring to a simmer. To serve, place the toasted ciabatta bread on a plate and top with the creamy mushrooms.
